Name: Pear & Cardamom Sidecar
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker.
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: A wonderful meld of aromatic ingredients. The combination of delicate cardamom spice and rich pear gives this cocktail an autumnal/winter feel.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Jason Scott at Oloroso in Edinburgh, Scotland. See: Sidecar history and  variations
